query_1.text: Who was Napoleon Bonaparte and what were his major contributions to European history?

query_2.text: What significant events marked Napoleon Bonaparte's rise to power in France?

query_3.text: When did Napoleon Bonaparte become Emperor of the French, and what impact did this have on Europe?

query_4.text: Where did Napoleon Bonaparte conduct most of his military campaigns, and what were the outcomes of these battles?

query_5.text: Why did Napoleon Bonaparte's rule come to an end, leading to his exile?

query_6.text: How did Napoleon Bonaparte's legal reforms, particularly the Napoleonic Code, influence modern legal systems?
